about_the_game:
Twas The Night is a light-hearted city builder and management simulation where you take on the role of Santa Claus, from the humble beginnings of building wood toys to delivering future tech to children worldwide. Built by a solo game dev with the dream of becoming Santa Claus

What's included in the demo?

Our demo consists of the main gameplay and will end once you've completed 10 years each year is 365 seconds, a constant countdown to Christmas. During that time you'll have to build workshops and manage toy production while ensuring you have enough Christmas Spirit, which is the game's sole resource. Every year, you will have a chance to create new Christmas Traditions to enhance your Christmas Spirit production, allowing you to upgrade your workshops and unlock new toy combinations.

Keep an eye out for trends, as you invent new toys they can become so popular that every child wants one. This will cause an influx of toys in a short time. If you can fulfill the trend you'll get a Christmas Spirit bouns at the end of the year.

short_description: Build and manage Santa's North Pole mega-workshop in this festive city builder where workshops produce toys for the world's children. Spend Christmas Spirit to create new holiday traditions and upgrade your workshops, but lose your spirit and you'll cease to exist.
